description: Tonight in the War Chest, we have another new recruit for you: Shayne. The 20-year old stands 6' tall and weighs 180 lbs. The incredibly muscled gent (his chest is a-mazing) is visiting sunny Southern California where he says 'everything is beautiful.' He says when he was younger, he played football and is currently into power-lifting and martial arts. Again, his ripped body tells the tale. If there's any fat on him, I don't know where it could possibly be hidden.Major Wood directs this scene, and we get lots of great close-ups of Shayne's eye-popping abs. You could grate cheese or scrub laundry on them! He's got some cool tattoos up and down his left arm, along with the words 'demand respect' inked across his chest. With a body like that, I don't think Shayne has anything to worry about in the respect department.When he stands up in front of our full-length mirror next to the bed, we get to see his big, tall body in full view. And wow, it's something else. He's just got one of those god-like bods that are glorious to behold. Major Wood makes sure to get up underneath Shayne for a close-up, rear-end view of his muscled behind -- and of course, it's breathtaking too. (Oh, but wait until you see Shayne bump and grind his ass into the bed, humping it like his life depended on it.)As Shayne blows his load, he seems audibly surprised by its power, blurting out 'Oh shit!' Right after he shoots, he takes his finger and traces the cum into the creases between his bulging ab muscles. So fantastic. Shayne says we'll most definitely see him again soon, and I for one can't wait!
title: Shayne
